messages.subject: Re: Florida Condo
messages.msgSnippet: I don t want to send out unwanted stuff here, but I have some news to share, my family has a condo in Florida and none of us can make it there this year due to
messages.messageBody:
I don't want to send out unwanted stuff here, but I have some news to share,
my family has a condo in Florida and none of us can make it there this year
due to extenuated circumstances in our families, we would be willing to rent
it out to anyone who might be interested, the weeks are one two or three in
a row in Feb and it is large enough to hold more than one family! close to
lots of great homeschool adventures like Kennedy space center! I hope this
is not taken as an advertisement, as it is not meant that way, I just know
it will go empty and people are always looking for a place to stay!.
thanks

Tanya please respond privately if interested thanks michigan@...
